title: TechTalk
message: If you can have like two or three different index files in there, that would be just helpful. for me for the sake of like testing to show that like I can get multiple showing up. Yeah that's okay. And just let me know when you've got that done.
summary: The person is requesting for two or three different index files to be included for testing purposes, to demonstrate that multiple files can be displayed. They are asking for confirmation once this task has been completed.
